translations: n．现金收银机：用于存放现金、支票和信用卡收据的商店设备。
v．耕作，犁地：在土地上进行耕作，以便种植作物。

phrs.translation: 收款柜台, 直到, 名字

sentences.sentence: Next I am put on the tills, packing bags alongside Lindley.
sentences.translation: 我的下一岗位是银台，我在林德利旁边装袋子。

sentences.sentence: Shops are closed, unable to open their tills or process credit CARDS.
sentences.translation: 因为不能打开收银台抽屉或刷信用卡，商店都停止了营业。

sentences.sentence: No wonder you do not see long queues at the tills in many of the shops here.
sentences.translation: 难怪在许多店里都看不到收银台前排长龙的情形。
